column1: 1 These arrests were for violations of one of the U.S. Code Sections listed in this table's Methodology.  Arrests were not included for those made in a joint investigation with other agencies when a state or local code was used nor for Hate Crime cases when a different provision of the U.S.Code was used for the basis of arrest.

2 Population for the San Juan Field Office is a combination of the U.S. Census Bureau's estimated 2015 commonwealth total for Puerto Rico and the 2010 decennial census total for the U.S. Virgin Islands.
